content.label: I was a huge fan of the original game, and was excited to see a sequel. I could even tolerate the ads bombarding me nonstop after every level. You are allowed to play up to the first boss, then you need to sign up to ‚Äúrent‚Äù the game monthly with the service. I would gladly purchase the game, and several other games in their collection, but have no interest in renting games on a continuous basis just to continue visiting the game...like I‚Äôm sharing custody with a vindictive spouse. I would appreciate if there was an option to purchase individual games for those not wanting the service‚Äîthen you could still get at least some of my money instead of none of it.

title.label: Excellent game, but a question for ‚ÄúGamehub‚Äù

content.label:
First off, I enjoy the heck out of this game. If you ha e a Gamehub subscription, this should definitely be in your collection.

Having said that, I have a question for Gamehub. I purchased this game upon its initial release. If I upgrade the app now, will I be able to play my purchased game without being forced into you‚Äôre subscription service, or will I be forced to pay to play an app I have already bought? Thank you.
If you like grinding the same levels many times over, you might like this. If you don‚Äôt, don‚Äôt waste your time downloading this.

title.label: Game is worse after art changes update

content.label: The game has been altered in some ways that make it worse than it was when it was originally released.
Please update for 64 bit.  I miss playing this

BROKEN: after about 100 battles, a pop up trys and fails to load a white box in upper left hand corner. hangs the game. happens 100% of the time. game now impossible to play.
7-5-2018
please fix

Soooo glad I have not hit a max level yet.  I like to always have a reason to keep playing.  At level 23 and still going strong.  Hopefully the max level is so high that players will never hit it.

The rest of the game is really fun also, 5/5 stars from me.

PLEASE give us a guess on Facebook to when the next expansion is coming out.  It would be wicked if we could start combining items to make even better items or something

There are many apps produced that just slack off - sound, graphics, crashing, little unfinished areas, bugs. Not here.  I put my heart and soul into an app and it made me $10 after hundreds of hours.   I hope the lack of updates here isn't for that reason, this should be featured on App Store again.  This is one of the two reasons I refuse to update to iOS 11.
Great game! Just need update so I can play again
Liked the first, love this one even more

I always find myself playing this game out of the hundreds of apps I have purchased. The slot mechanic combined with an rpg feel is a great feature, that keeps you trying all sorts of combinations. The battles are fast which is good if you only have a few minutes to play. The comic book story board is very entertaining and I can honestly say this is an excellent value for just $2.99. I hope more chapters are added soon, along with new items, so support these guys and buy the game!
Fun game to kill some time.

This is one of the best games on the AppStore. I absolutely love the cool character designs, the slot-based rpg gameplay, the comic book style, and this game had to have had such a large amount of work put into it. This is extremely innovative and creative. I stayed up until four in the morning playing it because it was so fun and addictive! This deserves more attention! It's a very high quality game. I recommend it.
I really enjoy this game ... arpg in slot form really cool. Needs a bit more diverse loot but all in all great.
Takes all that was good about the first game and improves on it drastically. Lots of fun.
The same magic as the first game with a little more polish. Great iPhone game.
Fun to chill to.
Love the gameplay here, no IAPs and the gameplay is fresh and original.  Has an RPG feel to it.  Love to see this developer keep putting out high quality apps.
Most sequels don't live up to expectations but this is even better than the first!!
Really is a great mashup of different genres. Perfect game to chill and grind levels with.

title.label: Best of the best slot hybrids!!

content.label:
July 2015, Update: After over a year: still going strong, as described below:

These wonderful Developers could give valuable lessons to the rest on how to craft an excellent, best of casino genre game (v.s. The evil pods of Freemium and IAP Developer greed-based and "spendy" experiences).  Plus, with KC2, they even bested their exemplary King Cashing 1.  Unlike most slots, this one doesn't eventually bore a player into a snooze...

My highest compliments to these code artists (and I have reviewed many apps on iTunes during the past five years).  For the first time, if I could give an app 6 stars, this would be it; 'nuff said.
This game is well made with its old rpg style mix with other stuff. It would be worth getting.üòÄ
Sweet addictive spinning slots with RPG reward. Wow.

Nice update to old version. More of story line in this version. Many more options of weapons and partners. Graphic novel follows story line through game. You have to like spinning the Whell casino style a lot to play this game. Not too hard to slowly make progress to next level. Sometimes you win or loose by just  luck alone.

title.label: it's very funny and unique game.

content.label: I really enjoy this game. Lots of humors.
So much fun try KC #1 as well. Highly recommended.
I usually dislike gambling based RPGs, but this one gets two thumbs up. Both fun and hilarious.

This is a perfectly executed game. I am giving 4 stars despite that because the game form itself, slots, is not interesting for me personally and timing is super annoying for trying to stop the wheels, which seems to be the major skill. But it is more interesting than I would have expected.
Fun game with unique mechanics.  Great light rpg elements.

I generally never buy any games but made the exception for this one and glad to have made the purchase!
I played the first one and enjoyed and the sequel looked even more promising and especially with zombies which I love.
Good concept. Easy to play. Keeps you coming back.

I would never have guessed that you could combine an RPG game with a Slot machine and it would work.
...BUT IT DOES!
This game is lots of fun that never gets old.
It kept me playing for hours. Thank you very much, can't wait to see King Cashing 3!
This is a great RPG, lots of fun and really cool loot system. Love it!
A very well done and addictive mix of luck and strategy. The art's fantastic, and no IAPs. Great game.
Great Game!
Rpg and slots, levels, weapons, exp, does it get any better, highly addictive
Send help.
Unbelievably fun.

title.label: One of the best games on ios!

content.label: Fun, addicting gameplay and fantastic graphics and music make this an instabuy!  Easy to pick up quickly and play at any time, highly recommended, in fact I think this may be my all time favorite ios game available!

title.label: Great evolution of the first game

content.label: I enjoyed the first game and was looking forward to this one. At first I was out off by some of the changes but I played a few more rounds and realized that everything was done for a reason and fits well into the overall scheme. Great fun, a wonderful way to spend time.
Enjoyed the first greatly and this one even more!

title.label: Well done, and possibly too addictive

content.label: I can‚Äôt quite explain why this game hooks me.  Well, all right, I probably can: it mixes two highly addictive ingredients (RPGs and slot machines) in a way that is quite satisfying.  And when I say satisfying, I mean I‚Äôve lost sleep with that ‚Äújust one more‚Äù thing. You have been warned!
I spent about 3 minutes with this‚Ä¶‚Ä¶and deleted it.      ZERO stars
Awesomely addicting, and great artwork, concept, and gameplay! Cannot wait for issue 6!
Wasn't sure if i would like a game like this but I'm having a hard time putting it down, its one of my favorite iOS games. And for .99c you cant go wrong with this game i highly  recommend it.
Beautiful and fun game. Get it already, okay?
Wow. A fun game with no IAP. I will definitely buy more from this company. Thanks for not trying to bleed me dry like every other game developer.
It keeps getting better and better with each update. Fun fun!

title.label: Even better than the first one.

content.label: If you enjoyed the first game then this one is a must!

The mechanics and gameplay of this game are a lot of fun. I loved the first one and kinda miss the fantasy theme. I also can't really play this with my younger kids because of the intestines hanging out on some monsters and you have to fight against police officers and attack innocent people.  But this isn't the developer's fault, I'm just putting this here in case someone wanted to play with their children. As a game itself it is fun, I love the comic book style and the many, many pop culture references, and the tongue in cheek humor of it all.

My boyfriend had it on his iPad and I just needed to download it on mine! I could to stop playing. The only thing about this game is sometimes I think the slots are rigged...but that could be the case in any game. Regardless I love it!
